downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync 2010 Adoption and Training Kit: Lync Custom Intranet Site
downloadDescription: This zipped file contains a sample intranet site for Microsoft Lync 2010.
detailsSection: These sample webpages are modeled after the internal Microsoft Lync 2010 support site and can help you start to create a dedicated Lync intranet site for your organization. The sample site includes HTML source code for all Help pages. It also includes all the short how-to videos, Help topics, Microsoft PowerPoint training presentations, and other resources currently available online.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office 2010; Microsoft Office 2007; Microsoft Office 2003
installInstructionSection: To install the download, save the zipped file to a directory on your computer. After you save it, unzip it by right-clicking the file name, selecting Extract All, selecting a destination where you want the extracted files to reside, and then clicking Extract. To remove the download, delete the file from directory where you saved it.
